The Tiny JSONist — meet AI NuExtract

Looks like a bad words, but it is not. This is the best SML to take a text IN and give you a structured JSON OUT. Wanna know more?

Fabio Matricardi

·

Follow

Published in

Generative AI

·
11 min read
·
Aug 11, 2024

--

My Company started a simple project (at a first glance…) to integrate AI in our workflow.

We want to pre-process all the candidates CVs, build a database and use a LLM to ask question and find the best fit for specific needs.

Many have already talked about it, but when it comes to privacy protection of personal data, I believe we cannot simply rely on API calls to models like Claude or ChatGPT.

I decided to find a way to do the same with Small Language Models, that even a crappy computer can run.

In my quest, I received a tip from Stefano Fiorucci on Linkedin: a fellow Italian, software engineer at deepset.ai and a contributor to the Haystack framework.

In this article I will share with you what and how to use NuExtract, a powerful family of models trained in information extraction for structured data output. Something like…

--
